targets.query: (log_level : INFO OR log_level : info) and Logger: CEPH.*
(log_level : DEBUG OR log_level : debug ) and Logger: CEPH.*
(log_level : WARN OR log_level : warn) and Logger: CEPH.*
(log_level : info OR log_level : INFO) AND Logger: CEPH.OSD
(log_level : warn OR log_level : WARN) AND Logger: CEPH.OSD
(log_level : info OR log_level : INFO) AND Logger: CEPH.MON
(log_level : warn OR log_level : WARN) AND Logger: CEPH.MON
(log_level : info OR log_level : INFO) AND Logger: CEPH.MGR
(log_level : warn OR log_level : WARN) AND Logger: CEPH.MGR
(log_level : info OR log_level : INFO) AND Logger: CEPH.GW
(log_level : warn OR log_level : WARN) AND Logger: CEPH.GW
